channel.title: Really pissing me off
channel.description:
I'm using the project insanity source, i need a compiler, and help to get rid of the edgeville limit (You cant leave edge or you get teled Back)
For the compiler i have JDK in my program files (x86)
My class path and path are Path : C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin Class : .;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

item.title: Really pissing me off
item.dc:creator: @Xsimplicity Xsimplicity
item.description:
@Xsimplicity wrote:

Says javas not found, but i have them in program files 86.
please help.

Read full topic

item.title: Really pissing me off
item.dc:creator: @darkangel996 darkangel996
item.description:
@darkangel996 wrote:

right click on compiler and click on “edit” then replace everything in there with this

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
